scripts.compile: echo "┏━━ Compiling Typescript-Config" && run lint && run cleardist && run jsc && run clearmodules && run re-yarn && echo "┗━━ Done"
scripts.lint:
echo "┣┳━ Running Lint
┃┣━ Abort 
┃┗━ No need to Lint"
scripts.cleardist:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearDist
┃┣━ Abort 
┃┗━ There is no dist"
scripts.jsc:
echo "┣┳━ Running Javascript Compiler
┃┣━ Abort 
┃┗━ No need to Compile"
scripts.clearmodules:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearModules
┃┠─ run rimraf ../../node_modules/@athenetz-sv/util-typescript-config" && rimraf ../../node_modules/@athenetz-sv/util-typescript-config && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.re-yarn:
echo "┣┳━ Running Re-Yarn
┃┠─ run yarn" && yarn && echo "┃┠─ run yarn dedupe" && yarn dedupe && echo "┃┗━ Done"
